description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Pumpkin Chop brings the "oooh" and "aaah" moments of carving pumpkins to your Xbox 360, without any of the mess.  Carve whatever you want into your pumpkins with the powerful but easy freehand tools in full 3D, then show off your creations in two Spooky Scenes!
description.short: Pumpkin Chop brings the "oooh" and "aaah" moments of carving pumpkins to your Xbox 360, without any of the mess.  Carve whatever you want into your pumpkins with the powerful but easy freehand tools in full 3D, then show off your creations in two Spooky Scenes!
